claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
explanation: A multi-panel forest plot showing relative vaccine effectiveness (with 95% confidence intervals) across various subgroups (cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease, cardiorespiratory disease, obesity, diabetes, and any of the above) for PCR-confirmed influenza, hospitalization for PCR-confirmed influenza, and hospitalization for community-acquired pneumonia. The figure presents effectiveness estimates across clinical subgroups and does not provide any information about antigenic matching or strain selection by WHO or FDA, so it does not support the claim.
